identificationModule.briefTitle: Cream Containing Sericin and Turmeric in Psoriasis Patients
identificationModule.officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Cream Containing Sericin and Turmeric in Psoriasis Patients

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Psoriasis lesion is divided into two parts. Half of the lesion will apply cream containing sericin and turmeric and another will apply steroid cream (control). The samples will be apply two times a day for 8 weeks. Psoriasis area and severity index, physician global assessment, body surface area of lesion, dermatology life quality index, Itching score, adverse reaction are evaluated before, after using the samples for 4 and 8 weeks.

armGroups.label: Sericin extract and turmeric extract cream
armGroups.description: Apply the sample 2 times a day for 8 weeks
interventionNames: Drug: Sericin extract and turmeric extract cream

armGroups.label: Triamcinolone acetonide 1% cream
armGroups.description: Apply the sample 2 times a day for 8 weeks

interventions.name: Sericin extract and turmeric extract cream
interventions.description: Apply the sample 2 times a day for 8 weeks
armGroupLabels: Sericin extract and turmeric extract cream

interventions.name: Triamcinolone acetonide 1% Cream
interventions.description: Apply the sample 2 times a day for 8 weeks

primaryOutcomes.description: Physician will evaluate the psoriasis lesion using Psoriasis Area and Severity Index. The score is graded 0 to 72 (low score means less severity and high score means high severity).

secondaryOutcomes.description: Physician will evaluate the psoriasis lesion using Physician Global Assessment score (0 to 6, 0 means completely cleared, except for possible residual nonerythematous discoloration and 6 means condition worsened).
Physician will evaluate body surface area of psoriasis lesion in percentage. (low percentage means the lesion area decrease and high percentage means the lesion area increase).
Patients will assess dermatology life quality score (0 to 30, 0 means high life quality and 30 means low life quality).
Patients will assess itching score using visual analogue scale (0 to 10, 0 means low severity and 10 means high severity).

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age over 18 years
* Patients with body surface area of psoriasis lesion less than 10, have psoriasis area and severity index less than 10 , and no lesion at face, hands,feet, and genital area
* No topical application on psoriasis lesion at least 2 weeks
* Willing to attend the study

Exclusion Criteria:

* Uncontrolled diseases
* Allergic to sericin turmeric and steroid
* Other skin diseases
* Pregnancy and lactation

ancestors.term: Hormones, Hormone Substitutes, and Hormone Antagonists
